name: HomologicalComplex.restriction_d
initialProofState:
Œπ : Type u_1
Œπ' : Type u_2
c : ComplexShape Œπ
c' : ComplexShape Œπ'
C : Type u_3
inst‚úù¬π : CategoryTheory.Category.{u_4, u_3} C
inst‚úù : CategoryTheory.Limits.HasZeroMorphisms C
K : HomologicalComplex C c'
e : c.Embedding c'
x‚úù¬π x‚úù : Œπ
‚ä¢ Eq ((K.restriction e).d x‚úù¬π x‚úù) (K.d (e.f x‚úù¬π) (e.f x‚úù))
decl:
/-- Given `K : HomologicalComplex C c'` and `e : c.Embedding c'` (satisfying `[e.IsRelIff]`),
this is the homological complex in `HomologicalComplex C c` obtained by restriction. -/
@[simps]
def restriction : HomologicalComplex C c where
  X i := K.X (e.f i)
  d _ _ := K.d _ _
  shape i j hij := K.shape _ _ (by simpa only [‚Üê e.rel_iff] using hij)

name: HomologicalComplex.restriction_d_eq
initialProofState:
Œπ : Type u_1
Œπ' : Type u_2
c : ComplexShape Œπ
c' : ComplexShape Œπ'
C : Type u_3
inst‚úù¬≤ : CategoryTheory.Category.{u_4, u_3} C
inst‚úù¬π : CategoryTheory.Limits.HasZeroMorphisms C
K : HomologicalComplex C c'
e : c.Embedding c'
inst‚úù : e.IsRelIff
i j : Œπ
i' j' : Œπ'
hi : Eq (e.f i) i'
hj : Eq (e.f j) j'
‚ä¢ Eq ((K.restriction e).d i j) (CategoryTheory.CategoryStruct.comp (K.restrictionXIso e hi).hom (CategoryTheory.CategoryStruct.comp (K.d i' j') (K.restrictionXIso e hj).inv))
decl:
@[reassoc]
lemma restriction_d_eq {i j : Œπ} {i' j' : Œπ'} (hi : e.f i = i') (hj : e.f j = j') :
    (K.restriction e).d i j = (K.restrictionXIso e hi).hom ‚â´ K.d i' j' ‚â´
      (K.restrictionXIso e hj).inv := by
  subst hi hj
  simp [restrictionXIso]

name: HomologicalComplex.restrictionMap_f
initialProofState:
Œπ : Type u_1
Œπ' : Type u_2
c : ComplexShape Œπ
c' : ComplexShape Œπ'
C : Type u_3
inst‚úù¬π : CategoryTheory.Category.{u_4, u_3} C
inst‚úù : CategoryTheory.Limits.HasZeroMorphisms C
K L : HomologicalComplex C c'
œÜ : Quiver.Hom K L
e : c.Embedding c'
i : Œπ
‚ä¢ Eq ((HomologicalComplex.restrictionMap œÜ e).f i) (œÜ.f (e.f i))
decl:
/-- The morphism `K.restriction e ‚ü∂ L.restriction e` induced by a morphism `œÜ : K ‚ü∂ L`. -/
@[simps]
def restrictionMap : K.restriction e ‚ü∂ L.restriction e where
  f i := œÜ.f (e.f i)

‚ä¢ Eq (CategoryTheory.CategoryStruct.comp (HomologicalComplex.restrictionMap (CategoryTheory.CategoryStruct.comp œÜ œÜ') e) h) (CategoryTheory.CategoryStruct.comp (HomologicalComplex.restrictionMap œÜ e) (CategoryTheory.CategoryStruct.comp (HomologicalComplex.restrictionMap œÜ' e) h))

name: ComplexShape.Embedding.restrictionFunctor_obj
initialProofState:
Œπ : Type u_1
Œπ' : Type u_2
c : ComplexShape Œπ
c' : ComplexShape Œπ'
e : c.Embedding c'
C : Type u_3
inst‚úù¬π : CategoryTheory.Category.{u_4, u_3} C
inst‚úù : CategoryTheory.Limits.HasZeroMorphisms C
K : HomologicalComplex C c'
‚ä¢ Eq ((e.restrictionFunctor C).obj K) (K.restriction e)
decl:
/-- Given `e : ComplexShape.Embedding c c'`, this is the restriction
functor `HomologicalComplex C c' ‚•§ HomologicalComplex C c`. -/
@[simps]
noncomputable def restrictionFunctor [HasZeroMorphisms C] :
    HomologicalComplex C c' ‚•§ HomologicalComplex C c where
  obj K := K.restriction e
  map œÜ := HomologicalComplex.restrictionMap œÜ e
